item.title: A Peculiar Speculation Chapter Three: Beauty is in the Eyesight of the Beholder
item.description: I was getting older and my glasses obsession was becoming part of me.

item.title: A Peculiar Speculation Chapter Two: The Back of the Class
item.description: Enough time lapsed in between my newfound obsession with Rachel’s glasses that I began to feel things were back to normal.

item.title: “A Peculiar Speculation” Chapter One: The Scarlet Letter
item.description: I was in 3rd grade when I was first beguiled by girls in my school.
